artefact: Find out what prison someone is in

artefact.overview: The Prisoner Location Service can help you track down a person you know is in prison, if you're not sure which one.
artefact.more_information:
You can contact the Prisoner Location Service by telephone or email:

$C
0121 626 3474  
<prisoner.location.service@noms.gsi.gov.uk>

$C

You can also write to:

$A
Prisoner Location Service  
PO Box 2152  
Birmingham  
B15 1SD 
$A
artefact.introduction: If you know someone’s in prison but unsure which one, the Prisoner Location Service can help you find them. You must know the person's full name and date of birth. You must also give some personal details so that the prisoner can decide whether or not they want to make contact.
